vote.title: Appointment of Raja Sundararajan, Senior Vice President, American Electric Power, to serve on the Central Ohio Regional Transit Authority Board of Trustees, replacing Julie Sloat, with a term expiration date of March 31, 2023 (resume attached).

Appointment of Raja Sundararajan, Senior Vice President, American Electric Power, to serve on the Central Ohio Regional Transit Authority Board of Trustees, replacing Julie Sloat, with a term expiration date of March 31, 2023 (resume attached).
